title: How to Make a Natural Skin Peel

steps.title: Gently heat together one packet unflavored gelatin, the juice of one lemon and one orange.
steps.content: Gently heat together one packet unflavored gelatin, the juice of one lemon and one orange. Heat until the gelatin is completely dissolved. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Apply a thin layer to the face and neck areas.
steps.content: Apply a thin layer to the face and neck areas.

steps.title: Leave on for 20 to 25 minutes, or until dry.
steps.content: Leave on for 20 to 25 minutes, or until dry.

steps.title: Rinse off completely with warm water.
steps.content: Rinse off completely with warm water. [2] X Trustworthy Source American Academy of Dermatology Professional organization made of over 20,000 certified dermatologists Go to source

steps.title: Pat dry gently with a soft toweling cloth.
steps.content: Pat dry gently with a soft toweling cloth.
